name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar
description:
Massive Electro energy is coursing through this thundering ancient sacrificial altar.
The dispersed Electro elements constantly dispel Energy.
You shall earn Weapon Ascension Materials, if — and only if — you can pass the trial.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar I
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar II
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar III
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed. Lightning bolts will periodically fall from above, dealing Electro DMG and completely draining the hit character's Energy. Lightning bolts may leave ball lightning.

domainLevels.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar IV
disorder: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed. Lightning bolts will periodically fall from above, dealing Electro DMG and completely draining the hit character's Energy. Lightning bolts may leave ball lightning.
